content:
t during Chapter One of the first Act. Completing Daughter of Darkness will progress Shadowheart story forward. This page includes all possible journal updates listed in the objectives followed by the Walkthrough below including the related Companion Quests, The Chosen of Shar and A Familiar Face.

Daughter of Darkness Objectives & Journals

Continue travelling with Shadowheart.

We recruited a Half-Elf named Shadowheart. She was also aboard the Nautiloid - and infected with a parasite. We learn
